title: EmuDeck Gaming Mode
description:
Now you can update or customize EmuDeck directly in Gaming Mode, no need to go into Desktop Mode. Just make sure to run SteamRomManager to add the new launcher for EmuDeck
To add games through SteamRomManager you still need to use Desktop mode

title: UI / UX tweaks
description:
- New Confirmation page ( Custom Mode )
- Scrollbars for overflowing content
- RetroAchievements on Tools & Stuff
- Improved Hotkeys on Emulator Guides

title: New Emulators

title: Dolphin Configuration update
description:
- Keep window on top false
-WSHack off by default
-Vsync = ON
-Gamecube controllers standardized using the profile.
-Unlock FPS changed to Start + R2
-Increase Emu Speed = Select + R2
-Decrease Emu Speed = Select + L2

title: Bug fixes & Small Features

- Steam Shortcut path bulk update
